messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Soten tsuba??
messages.msgSnippet: Hi David; Ok, just my eyes. On the seppa dai it looked as if the shakudo was worn thin and there was a yellow plate under it, that is why my comment. John ...
messages.messageBody:
Hi David;

Ok, just my eyes.

On the seppa dai it looked as if the shakudo was worn thin and there was a yellow plate under it, that is why my comment.

John
----- Original Message -----
From: David McDonald
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, June 11, 2004 12:01 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: Soten tsuba??


Dear John

It is a shakudo plate with a gold rim.
I see no brass at all.

Thanks for looking.

later
david

Dear Rich Now try the link. later david Message: 2 Date: Thu, 10 Jun
2004 22:19:53 -0000 From: "alchemyst" <alchemyst@...> Subject: Re:
Soten tsuba?? --- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, David McDonald
<jswords@m...> wrote:

>> Dear Group

>

Soten.

>>

>>
>> And what is the age?
>>

David -

Can't get images to load on the page. Get message
"bad request". I think it's because there are spaces in
the file names or they are too long for some of the
older browsers.

Rich

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Soten tsuba??
messages.msgSnippet: Hi David; From the photos it looks as if the plate is brass with shakudo and other soft metals applied to the surface. I have never run into a Soten plate made
messages.messageBody:
Hi David;

From the photos it looks as if the plate is brass with shakudo and other soft metals applied to the surface.

I have never run into a Soten plate made out of brass and covered with shakudo.

John


----- Original Message -----
From: David McDonald
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 2004 1:20 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Soten tsuba??


Dear Group

Can anyone tell me if the first tsuba on the following web page is Soten.

http://www.montanairon.com/images.html

And what is the age?

Thanks for any help.

later
david
